<title level="1" right="Rules">[Darkvision and Greater Darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=2410)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 433 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A creature with darkvision or greater darkvision can see perfectly well in areas of [darkness](/Rules.aspx?ID=2404) and [dim light](/Rules.aspx?ID=2403), though such vision is in black and white only. Some forms of magical darkness, such as a 4th-rank [_darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1480) spell, block normal darkvision. A creature with greater darkvision, however, can see through even these forms of magical darkness.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
